description: This file implements server-side process functions for an HTTP proxy session, including buffer retrieval, query processing, data reception, indicator for session completion, message sending, and connection management to the server.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE HttpPsoGetServerBuffer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves the buffer descriptor handle for receiving data. Currently returns NULL, indicating no specific buffer.

methods.name: ULONG HttpPsoQueryForServer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hBufferContext)
methods.description: Determines the processing mode for incoming server data based on the current message and connection states, such as forwarding, collecting, or processing.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpPsoRecvFromServer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hBufferContext)
methods.description: Processes received data payloads from the server, updating session state based on the processing results.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpPsoFinishedByServer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hBufferContext)
methods.description: Handles cleanup and finalization when the server indicates that no more data will be sent, freeing the buffer descriptor if necessary.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpPsoSendToServer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMessage,ULONG ulSendFlags)
methods.description: Sends a request message to the server, optionally including headers and body depending on flags.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpPsoConnectToServer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Establishes a connection to the server, resolves hostname, and creates a socket, updating session state accordingly.
